entry.title: Monday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of showers this evening. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light early this evening. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Monday 24 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of showers. High 11. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness late in the morning then 30 percent chance of showers in the afternoon. Showers beginning late in the afternoon. Wind becoming west 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning. High 11. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Monday 24 April 2023
